nodes.text: A duel took place on the planet Felucia around 21 BBY during the Clone Wars, a conflict between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems. On Felucia, Jedi General Obi-Wan Kenobi engaged General Grievous, and the pair fought a fierce duel using their lightsabers.

So far, the duel has only been briefly mentioned in 2009's The Essential Atlas, a reference book written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace. The outcome of the battle and any other points of information have yet to be revealed.
